meanings.definition: The sport or activity of riding on a board with a sail attached.
meanings.sent1: Boardsailings can be a thrilling experience on a windy day.
meanings.sent2: Many people enjoy boardsailings as a fun way to spend time on the water.
meanings.sent3: During boardsailings, it's important to watch out for unexpected gusts of wind.
meanings.sent4: Her boardsailings adventure was like dancing with the waves under the sun.
meanings.sent5: The colorful sail fluttered in the wind during the exciting boardsailings competition.

meanings.definition: The act of participating in the sport of boardsailing.
meanings.sent1: After months of practice, she finally mastered boardsailings.
meanings.sent2: The boardsailings event attracted participants from all over the world.
meanings.sent3: His boardsailings skills improved dramatically after taking lessons.
meanings.sent4: In the world of boardsailings, teamwork and strategy play crucial roles.
meanings.sent5: The adrenaline rush from boardsailings kept him coming back for more.
